infotexts.entitydescription.reversebeartrap: Handmade device that works like bear trap but reversed. Looks like it's should be worn on head.
infotexts.entitydescription.reversebeartrapbroken: Handmade device that works like bear trap but reversed. Looks like it's should be worn on head.
infotexts.entitydescription.stasky: Not as effective as regular handcuffs, but better than nothing I guess.
infotexts.handnabequipconfirmation: Are you sure you want to put zip ties on?
infotexts.entitydescription.plasticbag: You can store multiple items inside or put it on your head.
infotexts.entitydescription.shahidka: It's not dangerous on its own, but if you put some explosives inside...
infotexts.entitydescription.shahidkatimer: Improvised vest with lock and detonator, will only close on victim if explosives are inside, activates after 2 minutes.
infotexts.entitydescription.lqmolotov: A classic homemade incendiary grenade, however this variant looks so-so.
infotexts.entitydescription.diybomb: A simple explosive compound activated by impact.
infotexts.entitydescription.rrmorbusine: A .38 round for the revolver with morbusine
infotexts.entitydescription.rrcyanide: A .38 round for the revolver with cyanide
infotexts.entitydescription.rrdeliriumine: A .38 round for the revolver with deliriumine
infotexts.entitydescription.blindfold: When worn, obstructs vision. Ineffective on bots.
infotexts.entitydescription.muzzle: When worn, prevents any kind of speech.
infotexts.entitydescription.emag: Access Level Copy Device. To copy the access level you need to put ID inside.
